title: ISic000090. I.Sicily inscription 000090
body:
Facsimile Images

Divo ((ivy-leaf))
Commodo ((·))
Aug(usto) ((·))
d(ecreto) d(ecurionum)
5((·)) p(ecunia) ((·)) p(ublica) ((·))

Apparatus criticus

Text from autopsy; Bivona discerns traces of a number of letters from a previously erased text, but these could not be confirmed on autopsy.

English translation

To the Divine Commodus Augustus, by decree of the decuriones, at public expense.

commentary

bibliography
